Source code for data.DataBase

import dataclasses
import pandas as pd
from data.AbstractData import AbstractData



[docs]@dataclasses.dataclass
class DataBase(AbstractData):
    config_path = r"D:\GYLD\GIT\Artificial%20Intelligence\Bot\parameters.json"

    def __init__(self):
        import json
        config = open(self.config_path)
        self.param = json.load(config)
        self.server = self.param["server"]
        self.user_name = self.param["user_name"]
        self.key = self.param["key"]
        self.data_warehouse = self.param["data_warehouse"]
        self.data_base_mining = self.param["data_mining"]
        self.data_base_bot = self.param["data_bot"]
        self.data_warehouse_con_str = "mssql+pymssql://" + self.user_name + ":" + self.key + self.server + "/" + self.data_warehouse
        self.data_base_bot_con_str = "mssql+pymssql://" + self.user_name + ":" + self.key + self.server + "/" + self.data_base_bot
        self.data_base_mining_con_str = "mssql+pymssql://" + self.user_name + ":" + self.key + self.server + "/" + self.data_base_mining


[docs]    def load_from_warehouse(self, query, param=None) -> pd.DataFrame:
        return pd.read_sql(query, self.data_warehouse_con_str)



[docs]    def load_from_mining_database(self, query, param=None) -> pd.DataFrame:
        return pd.read_sql(query, self.data_base_mining_con_str)



[docs]    def load_from_bot_database(self, query, param=None) -> pd.DataFrame:
        return pd.read_sql(query, self.data_base_bot_con_str)



[docs]    def save_to_warehouse(self, data_frame: pd.DataFrame, data_table_name, param=None) -> None:
        param = self._pre_save(param)
        data_frame.to_sql(data_table_name, self.data_warehouse_con_str, if_exists=param["if_exists"],
                          chunksize=param["chunksize"], index=False)



[docs]    def save_to_mining_database(self, data_frame: pd.DataFrame, data_table_name, param=None) -> None:
        param = self._pre_save(param)
        print(self.data_base_mining_con_str)
        data_frame.to_sql(data_table_name, self.data_base_mining_con_str, if_exists=param["if_exists"],
                          chunksize=param["chunksize"], index=False)



[docs]    def save_to_bot_database(self, data_frame: pd.DataFrame, data_table_name, param=None) -> None:
        param = self._pre_save(param)
        data_frame.to_sql(data_table_name, self.data_base_bot_con_str, if_exists=param["if_exists"],
                          chunksize=param["chunksize"], index=False)


    def _pre_save(self, param):
        if param is None:
            param = dict
        if "if_exists" not in param.keys():
            param["if_exists"] = 'replace'
        if "chunksize" not in param.keys():
            param["chunksize"] = 100
        return param
